import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../App.css' import logo from "../assets/logo.png" import picture from "../assets/profile.jpeg" import Check from './check' import { menuItem } from './ConstantList' export default function Sidebar() { const [inactive, setInactive] = useState(false) const [expand, setExpand] = useState(false) return (
setInactive(!inactive)} className='toggle-button'>
    {menuItem.map((item)=>
  • setExpand(!expand)} className={`menu-item ${inactive ? "inactive" : ""}`}> {item.name}
    • )}
Tchegnebe Rodrigue

Superviseur

) }
